did.abstract: Letters between members of the Dixon and Faircloth families of Greenville, Holliday Hill, and Kinston N.C. as well as other locations. Subjects include enslaved persons; the Civil War and disillusionment in the North after Bull Run; plans to build a house with slave labor; conversion to Christianity; revivals; and Dixon and Holliday family genealogy.
